channel.title: Pk Desert Alpha V1 (Winterloves Better Peformance)
channel.description:
[CENTER]Hi All
Well i have been working on my source now for a little while on and off, and as the release of rog3r winterloves, id like to give you my release,
this source doesnt have alot of features because i have been working on its stabilty to hold and get rid of the horrible programming.
winterloves was only a source for cheating and was not created to become a server, with some help from my friends
[ul]Graham Steve SamuralBlood2 Palidino76[/ul]
the source now has alot better performance
Here is a small list i have done
Removed Huge Arrays and replace with Hashtables and LinkLists Added NPC Spawning (Loads In XML - Using XStream) Made NPCS use ArrayList insted of the Array Made The Item Loading more better Package the source(sirpkp00n.org isnt online atm) Packets and Commands are in a HashMap + also load in xml (<3 Graham and rsc soruce for help) Started a MySQL base but have not completed Server Has A ConfigManager in xml (Config.xml) EventSystem Refracted a few Class names
Alot more stuff i done but cant rember lol
You will need Eclipes to run the source
Link: [url=http://uppit.com/HJEI4G]http://uppit.com/HJEI4G[/url][/CENTER]
PS: if anyone has ever done Jython intergration please contact me
[CENTER]Packet XML[/CENTER]
[CODE]<Packet-array> <Packet> <id> <int>248</int> <int>164</int> <int>98</int> </id> <classDir>org.sirpkp00n.pk_desert.net.packets.packet.Walking</classDir> </Packet> <Packet> <id> <int>4</int> </id> <classDir>org.sirpkp00n.pk_desert.net.packets.packet.PlayerChat</classDir> </Packet> <Packet> <id> <int>241</int> </id> <classDir>org.sirpkp00n.pk_desert.net.packets.packet.ChangePlace</classDir> </Packet> <Packet> <id> <int>41</int> </id> <classDir>org.sirpkp00n.pk_desert.net.packets.packet.WearItem</classDir> </Packet> <Packet> <id> <int>145</int> </id> <classDir>org.sirpkp00n.pk_desert.net.packets.packet.RemoveItem</classDir> </Packet> <Packet> <id> <int>174</int> </id> <classDir>org.sirpkp00n.pk_desert.net.packets.packet.Bank10</classDir> </Packet> <Packet> <id> <int>43</int> </id> <classDir>org.sirpkp00n.pk_desert.net.packets.packet.Bank5</classDir> </Packet> <Packet> <id> <int>129</int> </id> <classDir>org.sirpkp00n.pk_desert.net.packets.packet.BankAll</classDir> </Packet> <Packet> <id> <int>135</int> </id> <classDir>org.sirpkp00n.pk_desert.net.packets.packet.BankX</classDir> </Packet> <Packet> <id> <int>208</int> </id> <classDir>org.sirpkp00n.pk_desert.net.packets.packet.BankX2</classDir> </Packet> <Packet> <id> <int>87</int> </id> <classDir>org.sirpkp00n.pk_desert.net.packets.packet.DropItem</classDir> </Packet> <Packet> <id> <int>185</int> </id> <classDir>org.sirpkp00n.pk_desert.net.packets.packet.ActionButtons</classDir> </Packet> <Packet> <id> <int>103</int> </id> <classDir>org.sirpkp00n.pk_desert.net.packets.packet.Commands</classDir> </Packet> <Packet> <id> <int>226</int> <int>0</int> <int>3</int> <int>130</int> <int>210</int> <int>202</int> <int>121</int> <int>86</int> <int>241</int> <int>252</int> <int>78</int> <int>148</int> <int>183</int> <int>230</int> <int>136</int> <int>189</int> <int>152</int> <int>200</int> <int>85</int> <int>165</int> <int>238</int> <int>150</int> <int>36</int> <int>246</int> <int>77</int>
</id> <classDir>org.sirpkp00n.pk_desert.net.packets.packet.UnusedPacket</classDir> </Packet> </Packet-array>[/CODE]
[CENTER]I am going to convert the packet array to an ArrayList [/CENTER]

item.description:
@sir_pk_p00n wrote:

[CENTER]Hi All

Well i have been working on my source now for a little while on and off, and as the release of rog3r winterloves, id like to give you my release,

this source doesnt have alot of features because i have been working on its stabilty to hold and get rid of the horrible programming.

winterloves was only a source for cheating and was not created to become a server, with some help from my friends

[ul]Graham
Steve
SamuralBlood2
Palidino76[/ul]

the source now has alot better performance

Here is a small list i have done

Removed Huge Arrays and replace with Hashtables and LinkLists
Added NPC Spawning (Loads In XML - Using XStream)
Made NPCS use ArrayList insted of the Array
Made The Item Loading more better
Package the source(sirpkp00n.org isnt online atm)
Packets and Commands are in a HashMap + also load in xml (<3 Graham and rsc soruce for help)
Started a MySQL base but have not completed
Server Has A ConfigManager in xml (Config.xml)
EventSystem
Refracted a few Class names

Alot more stuff i done but cant rember lol

You will need Eclipes to run the source

Link: http://uppit.com/HJEI4G[/CENTER]

PS: if anyone has ever done Jython intergration please contact me
